page1.name:
Map Enhancements 
and Artifacts
page1.hint: This page lets you select a variety of Map Enhancements and Artifacts to customize your game.
page1.popup: This page lets you select a variety of Map Enhancements and Artifacts to customize your game.

group0.name: Map Enhancements and Artifacts
group0.hint: These options let you customize certain aspects of a map and select scripted artifacts you wish to appear in the game.
group0.popup:
MAP ENHANCEMENTS AND ARTIFACTS 

These options let you customize certain aspects of a map and select scripted artifacts you wish to appear in the game.

page3.name:
Object Replacements, 
New and Enhanced Objects
page3.hint: This page lets you choose whether to replace existing objects, as well as new and enhanced Objects for inclusion in the game.
page3.popup: This page lets you choose whether to replace existing objects, as well as new and enhanced Objects for inclusion in the game.

group0.name: Object Replacements
group0.hint: Choose whether to replace existing adventure objects on the map.
group0.popup:
OBJECT REPLACEMENTS 

Choose whether to replace existing adventure objects on the map.

1.arrowTower:
{Attention:}

Arrow Tower Experience has been DISABLED because this is a Network game and the feature is not yet compatible with Network games.

12.cantBring: Unfortunately, my power is too limited to bring this powerful artifact to you.

14.noMon: Unfortunately, you didn't bring creatures accpeting the power of the altar with you.
14.chooseMon: Which creature do you want to transform?

33.fail: Living Scroll with the spell {"@spellName@"} did not find the target.

34.desc:
When entering battle, a card will emerge from the deck. Each card has a different effect.

Right-click on system options to disable the pre-battle messages that state which card was activated.

35.desc1: Learn next "week of" week on day 2

spell.table:
Randomly in the battle, @heroName@ may automatically cast an additional {@spellName@} spell at no cost.
Average casting chance is 1 of {@frequency@}.
spell.combat: At the moment it is 1 of {@frequency@}.

skill.debuff: @heroName@ will cast {@spellName@} on all enemy units at the beginning of each battle.
skill.buff: @heroName@ will cast {@spellName@} on all allied units at the beginning of each battle.
skill.8: @heroName@ adds {@mana@ mana} at the beginning of each battle. Amount further increases by 3 mana per hero level.
skill.11: All 1st and 2nd level creatures receive flying ability in the battle.
skill.24: Commander of this hero has {Death Stare}.
skill.26: @heroName@ reduces {@mana@ mana} of enemy hero at the beginning of each battle. Amount further decreases by 3 mana per hero level.

42.title:
Select your preferred garrison frequency.

NOTE: On large maps, you may notice a delay while loading.
42.award: Searching the garrison turns up some hidden treasure!

43.text:
{Я µ ¤ ѓ Ґ §}

Magic runes are carved on this Obelisk. Do you invoke their power to cast the spell?

44.extra:
"Wait a moment," the Wizard's tone carried a hint of astonishment. "It appears that @mon@ have been enhanced before! This will take me much more efforts to enhance them even more. I'm thinking of asking a bit extra for this job."

"What about these?"

45.noCityHall:
{Gold Reserve} 

 Sorry, but {City Hall} must be built before the Gold Reserve can be built.
45.alreadyBuilt: {~r}Sorry, but one of the buildings has already been improved today. Try again tomorrow.{~}
45.mainGoldReserveMsg:
{Gold Reserve} @requirementMsg@

 At the moment, the Gold Reserve brings the kingdom {@gold@ gold} per day.
45.upgrGoldReserveMsg:
You can improve the income of the Gold Reserve by {@gold@ gold.} 
 You need the following resources:
45.noResToUpgradeGoldReserve: {~r}Sorry, but you don't have enough resources to improve your Gold Reserve.{~}
45.noResToUpgradeUpgDwelling: {~r}Sorry, but you don't have enough resources to improve this Creatures Dwelling.{~}
45.noOneUpgDwelling:
{Dwelling Upgrading} 

 Sorry, but for additional recruitment of troops in this town, at least one improved Creatures Dwelling must be built.
45.mainCreaturesMsg:
{Dwelling Upgrading} @requirementMsg@

 You can increase the growth of creatures of your town. 
 Growth increase can only be done for upgraded dwellings. 

 Select the type of creatures to increase their growth:
45.upgradeDwellingMsg:
{Dwelling Upgrading} @requirementMsg@

 At the moment, this dwelling produces additional 
 {@count@ creatures} per week. 

 Improving this dwelling will increase the growth 
 by {@growth@} per week. 

 {Dwelling Upgrading price:}

46.description: Strikes and returns. No enemy retaliation. Berserk attack.

54.soldOut:
Usable {3} times a day.
Come back tomorrow.

59.description_upg: Piercing shot. Shot ignores 3+20% of target's defense.

65.question: Do you pay the toll to power-up this two-way lith?

66.msg:
Commander Witch Hut

While you visit the witch, your commander gets a lesson in @bonus@ from the witch's commander.

70.name: Undead King
70.visited: As you approach the ominous skull structure, you smell the horrible stench of blood.  Obviously, a battle has already been fought here.
70.reward: Upon defeating the Undead King and his guards, you find valuable gold, Mithril, and @number@ friendly Ghosts that you resurrect from the chamber's ashes!

71.join: Wearing the {Garb of the Forest Lord} has attracted volunteers to @heroName@'s army.
71.upgrade: The @monName@ in @heroName@'s army have been augmented by the power of @whose@ {@artName@}.
71.combiDesc0:
{The Garb of the Forest Lord}
Gives 1 War Unicorn, 2 Dendroid Soldiers, 4 Battle Dwarves, 8 Centaur Captains at the start of each week.
71.combiDesc1:
{The Vestments of Authority}
Multiplies your hero army strength by 3 (for neutral armies and Thieves Guild).

74.msg: Your hero is too tired to cast this spell. Try again next week.

102.67: Max at @unitLimit@ additional units per stack when trading.
102.16: Provokes a fight with 30 Ogres at the start of each week.

giveCreature.5.1: Impressed by @heroName@'s interest in Birds, some Royal Griffins join @whose@ army.
giveCreature.59.1: Mindful of @heroName@'s devotion to Death and its Pendants, some Zombies join @whose@ army.
giveCreature.119.1: Joyful at @heroName@'s interest in Life and its Pendants, some Sprites join @whose@ army.
giveCreature.35.0: Pleased with @heroName@'s ability to cast spells on magic resistant creatures, an Archmage joins @whose@ army.
giveCreature.35.1: Pleased with @heroName@'s ability to cast spells on magic resistant creatures, some Archmages join @whose@ army.
giveCreature.35.2: Pleased with @heroName@'s ability to cast spells on magic resistant creatures, and impressed by @whose@ devotion to Wisdom, some Archmages join @whose@ army.
giveCreature.103.0: Heartened by @heroName@'s protection from Dispel, a Mighty Gorgon joins @whose@ army.
giveCreature.103.1: Heartened by @heroName@'s protection from Dispel, some Mighty Gorgons join @whose@ army.
giveCreature.103.2: Heartened by @heroName@'s protection from Dispel, and impressed by @whose@ devotion to Defense, some Mighty Gorgons join @whose@ army.

105.no_market:
{Bank}

Sorry, but you can't visit the Bank without a Marketplace.
105.greeting:
Bank

"Welcome", the clerk says, "how can I help you?"
105.transfer_all: Transfer all Resources to another Player
105.transfer_one: Transfer specific Resources to another Player
105.cancel: No thanks. I've changed my mind.

loan.name: {Loan Bank}
loan.offer:
"We offer you a maximum of @max@ but charge 30% interest. The maximum loan available will increase over time.
Repayment will start tomorrow and we'll take half of the @resource@ in your treasury every day until the loan is repaid."
loan.input: "How many @resource@ (1-@max@) do you want to borrow?"
loan.limit: "I'm sorry, but you can't borrow more than the current maximum of @resource@."
loan.confirm: "Here you are. It was a pleasure doing business with you."
loan.cancel: "Don't worry, we'll keep this offer open for you. Come back whenever you want."
loan.collector: "We take a fee of @taken@, so you still owe us @owe@. We'll come back tomorrow."
loan.paid: "Congratulations. You've paid your last instalment of @taken@. Feel free to visit us again."
loan.debt: "Sorry, but you have an outstanding loan with us. Come back when you've paid your last instalment."

transfer.name: {Resource Trading Post}
transfer.all: Transfer ALL Resources including Gold and Mithril to...
transfer.input: Enter quantity of @resource@ (1-@max@) to be transferred:
transfer.no_resources: "Unfortunately, you have no Resources at all, so there's nothing to trade. Maybe time is on your side ..."
transfer.confirm_all: "All your resources have been transferred to the @name@ player."
transfer.confirm_one: "Your @resource@ have been transferred to the @name@ player."
transfer.cancel: "Maybe you want to trade another day. Feel free to visit us again."

109.title:
{Market of Time}

 We help you regain some of your lost years by teaching meditation techniques that let you forget useless skills. This frees up your mind for new learning. We charge a nominal fee of @gold@ gold coins for our service.
109.forget:
{Market of Time}

 Do you really want to forget this skill for @gold@ gold?
109.noMoney:
{Market of Time}

 You don't have enough money. Come back when you can afford our services.
109.noSkills:
{Market of Time}

 We're sorry @name@, but you need to know at least one skill first.
109.noMoves:
{Market of Time}

 Your hero is too tired. Come back tomorrow.

126.title: For achieving so much, @hero@ is granted @artifact@.

169.line2: What name do you wish this town to be known by?

186.title: Choose your Commander Type
186.cancel: I've changed my mind. I'll hire one later.

187.line2: What name do you wish this hero to be known by?

192.mainMsg:
{Transfer owner} 

 Chose the player you want to pass this object:
192.heroInTown:
{You can't transfer the town!} 

 You can't transfer the town to another player while your hero is in it. Please take out the hero and move them away from the town.
192.level_8:
{Transfer owner}

{God Creatures}' power doesn't allow to transfer this object.

201.ballista_description:
{Ballista}

The Ballista can target your enemy's troops in combat and can deal (1-50 + hero level) points of damage to an enemy unit prior to combat.
201.ballista_log: When preparing for battle, artillery deals incurable damage.
201.ammo_description:
{Supply Cart}

The Supply Cart ensures that your missile troops never run out of ammunition in combat and increases the (non-combat) effectiveness of a First Aid Tent and Ballista by 100%.

212.0: @heroName@ has uncovered a hidden stash of gold
212.1: @heroName@ has discovered a small quantity of resources
212.2: @heroName@ has spotted a large cache of resources
212.3: While on the march, @heroName@ spots a flowing spring
212.4: Ever watchful, @heroName@ spots a Phoenix feather lying on the ground
212.5: the faerie empowered @heroName@ with some of her magic
212.6: While out scouting, @heroName@ has met a wandering sage
212.7: @heroName@ spots a good vantage point at the top of a hill
212.8: @heroName@ has found a short-cut that will speed up army's journey
212.9.0: @heroName@ has discovered a @monName@ willing to join @whose@ army
212.9.1: While out scouting, @heroName@ has discovered a band of @monName@ willing to join @whose@ army
212.10:
A loud ruckus alerts @heroName@ to a large group of @monName@ just over the next hill.

Do you wish to fight the @monName@
212.11:
Hearing some noise, @heroName@ stops @whose@ army and scouts ahead. Just off the path @heroName@ spots a group of @monName@.

Do you wish to fight the @monName@

216.msg: @hero@'s powers of Resistance let @whom@ ignore the upgrades of some of @endStr@!

146.name: +@value@ Axe of @skillName@
146.description:
Gives hero +@value@ to Attack and one rank of @skillName@ skill.
or
Gives commander +5 Attack plus +1 after 6 victorious battles

147.name: +@value@ Mail of @skillName@
147.description:
Gives hero +@value@ to Defense and one rank of @skillName@ skill
or
Gives commander +12% Health plus +1% after every victorious battle.

148.name: +@value@ Sword of @skillName@
148.description:
Gives hero +@value@ to Attack and one rank of @skillName@ skill
orGives commander +12% Damage plus +1% after every victorious battle.

149.name: +@value@ Helm of @skillName@
149.description:
Gives hero +@value@ to Defense and one rank of @skillName@ skill
or
Gives commander self-resurrection after battle.

150.name: +@value@ Pendant of @skillName@
150.description:
Gives hero +@value@ to Power and one rank of @skillName@ skill
or
Gives commander +1 Magic Power plus +1 after every 10 victorious battles.

151.name: +@value@ Boots of @skillName@
151.description:
Gives hero +@value@ to Knowledge and one rank of @skillName@ skill
or
Gives commander +1 Speed plus +1 after 10 victorious battles.

152.name: +@value@ Bow of @skillName@
152.description:
Gives hero +@value@ to Attack and one rank of @skillName@ skill
or
Gives commander No Obstacle Penalty plus No Long-Range Penalty after 25 victorious battles.

153.name: +@value@ Ring of @skillName@
153.description:
Gives hero @value@ to Power and Knowledge and one rank of @skillName@ skill
or
Gives commander Breath Attack and Dragon Nature.

154.name: +@value@ Shield of @skillName@
154.description:
Gives hero @value@ to Defense and one rank of @skillName@ skill
or
Gives commander +5 Defense plus +1 after 6 victorious battles.

155.name: +@value@ Ring of @skillName@
155.description:
Gives hero +@value@ to all Primary Skills and one rank of @skillName@ skill
or
Gives commander all 6 Basic Skills at Advanced level.

220.deny:
{Allowable Neutral Towns}

You must select at least one type of town.

240.title:
W A R L O R D ' S   B A N N E R S

Change options of all @name@'s equipped banners to:
240.hp: +2 Health plus doubles stack's current Health bonus in combat.
240.attack: +2 Attack plus doubles stack's current Attack bonus in combat.
240.defence: +2 Defense plus doubles stack's current Defense bonus in combat.
240.damage: +1 Damage plus doubles stack's current Damage bonus (both min and max) in combat.
240.speed: +1 Speed plus doubles stack's current Speed bonus in combat.
240.experience: +50% experience the stack gains from a battle.
